channel.title: Posts on Old Guy New Trick
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Old Guy New Trick

item.title: Go Grapple a Cobra and Rest Easy
item.description: Creating a Go Based CLI App (Part One) Welcome back! Today I would like to start a multi-part blog posting on a new project that I am working on. If you read my first post, ‘CIRCLE OF (BLOG) LIFE’, you may have seen me mention my first Golang project - JBlastor.

item.title: Migrating Blog to Hugo
item.description: CIRCLE OF (BLOG) LIFE When I first began this journey several years back, including writing about my journey, I first used Jekyll. I barely knew what git was let alone Github Pages.
